author: Maxwell Strachan, Kate Lowenstein
title: You’re Not Going Back to Normal Office Life for a Long, Long Time
description: Many experts want the WFH workforce to stay put until a vaccine is approved. If you do head back, expect indoor masks, staggered schedules, small meetings, and the death of open-office plans.
content: Last Thursday, Mark Zuckerberg announced that he had decided to slow down plans to move Facebook employees back into their offices. In a statement, the CEO said that employees with the ability to work from home would continue to do so at least through May. Wh… [+12653 chars]
